LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.label: demanded
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.description: Spirits, booze, sauce, whatever you call it, we desire it. At least an occasional drink should be encouraged and we shouldn’t even think of sobriety.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Desired.description: Drinking is just plain fun, though not in excess.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_MildAbstinence.label: mild abstinence
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_MildAbstinence.description: Alcohol is okay when consumed in small dosages, but it is better to stay away from it as long as possible.
